wikipedia_page.main: Major General Charles Gerard Courtenay Vyvyan,  (born 29 September 1944) is a retired British Army officer. He served as Head of the British Defence Staff and Defence Attaché in Washington, D.C. (1997–2000), and Gentleman Usher of the Scarlet Rod (2006–2018).

response: * Major General Charles Vyvyan (born 1944), retired British Army officer, former head of the British Defence Staff and Scarlet Rod
